QuestData.Title: Protocol Recovery
QuestData.Description:
System repairs progressing. One key component needed: containment protocol.
Containment protocol will fully reboot defensive systems. Allow Titan Keeper Hezrel to properly maintain containment.
Scans indicate large creature within temple has absorbed slab containing containment protocol. Creature exists between this plane and Void.
Request: destruction of creature and retrieval of protocol.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Overlord Kraxis has the Containment Protocol... inside of itself!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Containment Protocol from Overlord Kraxis.
